summary: This mod makes all the races of Skyrim furry. Clothes, statues and other assets are also made furry. SOS-ready.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is an expansion and reworking of the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53938/?]Furry Age of Skyrim[/url] mod (with Trador's blessing). I've been posting version over at That Other Site for a while, and decided folks here might be amused by it as well.

In this mod, all human races are turned into canines: Nord/Wolf (Lykaios), Imperial/Jackal (Vaalsark), Breton/Fox, Redguard/Hyena (Kygarra). All mer races are turned into felines: High Elf/cheetah, Wood Elf/tiger, Dark Elf/panther, Orc/sabretooth lion. You can also play as a Snow Elf/Snow Leopard or Dremora/cat thing.

All races have digitigrade paw feet and claws on their hands. 

The mod includes a schlongs file for SOS compatibility. If you don't enable that ESP, you'll have no SOS dependency and your furries will strip to fundoshi-style underwear. If you do, every race gets its own sheathing animal-type equipment. You can also give them human-type equipment if you prefer. Hyena females get male equipment cuz they're hyenas. A bunch of my photos use revealing armor to show off the assets, but if you don't load those mods your furries will cover themselves up decently.

Statues and other statics have been made furry as well, as have the load screens.

This mod is marked adult because even without SOS there's nudity in the statues and load screens. The ESPs are all named "Yiffy Age" because that's what it's called over on the other site. I renamed it for Nexus both to credit Trador's original and because it's not really a sex mod.

Major credit to Trador who had the idea and to the people who made the original races. Go vote up their mods:
[list]
[*]Nord - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64466/?]Lykaios [/url](Wolf) by KrittaKitty
[*]Imperial - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13561/?]Vaalsark [/url](Jackal-ish) by Wolf of the Azar
[*]Breton - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62176/?]Fennec Fox[/url] by Jelly, new texture and adapted to Citrus mesh by Bad Dog
[*]Redguard - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61555/?]Kygarra [/url](Hyena) by Wolf of the Azar, adapted to Citrus mesh by Bad Dog

[/list]
Fox and kygarra heads were remade by me using the Citrus mesh. Feline heads were made by NightroModzz, also on the Citrus heads.
There are a ton of patches for a ton of mods. It will work with most mods that add NPCs without a patch, but the furries will be a bit boring (limited range of fur color). Mods that add races will have problems. 

[b][size=4]Installation[/size][/b]

I would not try to continue a current game. I expect the Skyrim engine would freak. The mod is hosted at a google drive because it's big. Use that if the Nexus download has problems.

All mods not listed above (and in brackets) are optional.
[list]
[*]-- Basics --
[*]SKSE
[*]SkyUI
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility[/url]
[*][url=http://dev.loverslab.com/files/file/2254-skse-register-custom-animation-events/]RCAE - Register custom animation events[/url], required and [i]not the same[/i] as SKSE
[*][Sexlab]
[*][SOS]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url] for collisions and jiggles]
[/list][list]
[*]--Bodies --
[*][UNP female body of your choice, e.g. UUNP, if you want nude females (and who doesn't?)]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17339/?]Bigger Argonian tails[/url]]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37521/?]Drachis Argonians[/url] for less lizard-y argonians]
[/list][list]
[*]-- Clothes --
[*][Any replacer armors if you want them, e.g. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34160/?]Sexy Vanilla Armor for UNP[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36903/?]Revealing Armors for SOS [/url]and Bad Dog's Skimpy CLothes, I stack all three. Furries don't like to be all bound up in clothes.]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22745/?]Footprints[/url] - Furries will leave pawprints.]
[*][Wet & Cold if you want it]
[/list][list]
[*]-- Mods that add NPCs are generally not going to do well with Yiffy Age. But the following are patched to work --
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27489/?]Northern Bathhouses[/url] load before YA because it has some odd edits]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81462/?]Diverse Skyrim[/url] -- Now that the races look more different, get more different races into the game]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73148/?#]Populated Roads, Paths[/url] for general busy-ness]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64654/?]Extra Bandits[/url] -- for more variation in bandits. Make sure you get 2.0--it's not the default]
[*][[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs[/url] -- NPCs with a backstory]
[*][[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36334/?]Inconsequential NPCs[/url] -- NPCs without a backstory]
[*][[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84946/?]Beyond Skyrim - Bruma[/url]]
[*][[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35841/?]Helgen Reborn[/url] -- for when the vanilla story gets old]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]Sofia [/url]-- new look, same attitude]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393/?]Vilja [/url]-- ditto]
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40960/?]Inigo [/url]-- still the best follower in Skyrim]
[*][[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61218/?]Imperious[/url] -- For fun better race buffs]
[*][[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36849/?]Immersive College of Winterhold[/url] for a much better College experience. very much recommended if you're a mage.]
[/list][list]
[*]-- Then the main mod --
[*][url=https://drive.google.com/open?id=1f9Hn-f12GinQgosz8255H77BD3w5TKRH]Yiffy_Age[/url] - If you don't want schlongs, just enable YiffyAgeConsolidated.esp and then you don't need SOS either. Otherwise, enable all esps.
[/list][list]
[*]-- Then add patches for the mods you use--
[*](All these are available at the main link above.)
[*][Yiffy Blaze Anthro Schlong if you want the VectorPlexus muscular schlong on your furries]
[*][Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch if using USLEEP. This goes first!]
[*][Yiffy Age Drachis Patch if using Drachis Argonians]
[*][Wet and Cold addon if you need that]
[*][Skyrim Immersive Creatures patch - lets you wear the ancient draugr SIC makes available. also furrifies the SIC NPCs]
[*][Populated Roads Patch if used]
[*][Extra Bandits Patch if used]
[*][Inconsequential NPC patch, if used]
[*][Interesting NPC patch, if used]
[*][Diverse Skyrim Patch, if used]
[*][Beyond Skyrim - Bruma Patch, if used]
[*][Imperious Patch, if used]
[*][Furry Sofia, if you're including her]
[*][Vilja Patch, for Vilja's special look and hangers-on]
[*][Inigo patch - he doesn't change, but he's got an NPC or two]
[*][Apachii_Skyhair_Patch if using Apachii hair - [i]Not yet available, I'll do the hair soon [/i]]
[*] 
[*]-- Then add options --
[*][[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4779/?]Glowing Eyes for Khajiit[/url] for furry chatoyance, not really glowing]
[*][[url=http://dev.loverslab.com/files/file/2431-naturalistic-hdt-jiggle-and-collisions-xml-set/]Naturalistic HDT Jiggle and Collision set[/url] if you don't have a set you like better]
[*][[url=https://drive.google.com/open?id=0Bz-2a_e08IXFTWY2VExGR2NDYlk]Bad Dog EZ HDT[/url] if you want my female bodies]
[*]
[/list]
author: Bad Pup
